sentences.en: Boys are more likely to choose the trumpet, guitar or percussion.
sentences.cn: 男孩子倾向选择吹小号 、 弹吉他等.

sentences.en: Chest percussion and vibration are used with postural drainage to help dislodge secretions.
sentences.cn: 在做体位引流时要敲击和振动胸部帮助分泌物松动排出.
金钻探取代了冲击钻探.

sentences.en: He has dullness to percussion and spider angiomas.
sentences.cn: 他肚子叩诊上去浊音,并且蜘蛛痣.

sentences.en: I had some professional courses in vocalism, dance, and percussion instrument.
sentences.cn: 我学过声乐技巧 、 舞蹈和打击乐的专业课程.

sentences.en: In an orchestra, people who play percussion instruments sit at the back.
sentences.cn: 在管弦乐队中，演奏打击乐器的人会坐在后面。

sentences.en: In this first works, to enjoy their singing, reciting, music and percussion.
sentences.cn: 在这首作品中, 他们尽兴地歌唱 、 诵读 、 奏乐、敲击.

sentences.en: Percussion of the abdomen is often omitted.
Some pieces are also scored for piano, strings, and percussion.
sentences.cn: 一些段落是给钢琴 、 弦乐和打击乐谱曲的.

sentences.en: The invention of percussion compositions for igniting powders is usually attributed to Forsyth.
sentences.cn: 通常认为用以引燃的击发药是弗尔赛思发明的.

sentences.en: The opera features unique solo singing, refined acting, rich percussion and funny comedians.
sentences.cn: 戏剧的特点是拥有独特的唱腔 、 优美的表演 、 丰富的配乐、滑稽可笑的喜剧演员.

sentences.en: The track features Joey Langton on percussion .
sentences.cn: 唱片的这段乐曲是乔伊∙兰顿演奏的打击乐。

sentences.en: There are the usual strings, woodwind, brass and percussion of a western orchestra.
sentences.cn: 有常用的弦乐器 、 木管乐器 、 铜管和打击乐器.

sentences.en: They had a bass and a piano and a sax and percussion.
sentences.cn: 他们有一把低音吉他、一架钢琴、一管萨克斯和打击乐器。

sentences.en: This is a large orchestra, with a vast percussion section.
sentences.cn: 这是一支拥有很大的打击乐器组的大型管弦乐队。

sentences.en: Tonight we have Paul Duke on percussion (= playing a percussion instrument ) .
sentences.cn: 今晚我们请到保罗·杜克先生负责打击乐。

words.tran_cn: 敲击乐器演奏者；打击乐器乐手
用叩诊法作为诊断的手段
[临床]叩诊；振动；碰撞；敲打乐器；打击乐器组

phrases.tran_cn: 冲击钻探，冲魂；冲唤钻眼，冲魂井

trans.tran_cn: 敲打，碰撞，振动，<音>打击乐器，[医]扣诊法
trans.tran_en: the sound or effect of two things hitting each other with great force
